authors: Matt Zaldivar, Thanks to Brian Shields and Benjamin Bandelow, I used their Exalted sheet as a starting point, Also Thanks to Lithl for help with the quintessence wheel
instructions: # Mage: The Ascention Character Sheet For use in the classic World of Darkness.  Designed to function much like an actual paper sheet would.  With the most notable exception being that you can roll Arete and Willpower directy from the sheet.  Also, The Dice Pool section in the center at the bottom allow one to select an Attribute and/or Ability to roll.  All rolls from the sheet are of the from {Xd10!}>Df1, where X is the number of dice and D is the difficulty.  These roll do not recognize botches. Further, the rolls will prompt the user to modify the number of dice rolled and set the difficuly.  The defaults for these are 0 and 6 repectively.
